levels

Class BaseLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • levels.BaseLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LevelInformation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectHit, FinalFour, Green3, WideEasy

    public abstract class BaseLevel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LevelInformation
    The basic level class.
    Author:
    Tomer Davidor, Guy Blachar
